Description
AbstractDAO<T>
Generic class that implements the CRUD SQL operations based on reflection.

Abstract class that implements the view panel model.

Singleton implementation of the Validator interface.
App
The class that implements the application.

Class that implements specific bill SQL queries.

The bill panel.

Implementation of the ActionListener interface associated to the read SQL query.
BillT
Bill data transfer object.
BillUpdatesActionListener
Implementation of the ActionListener interface associated to the create SQL query in the order panel.
Client
Represents a possible client with a name, a phone number, an address and an id.

Class that implements specific client SQL queries.

The client panel.

Implementation of the ActionListener interface associated to the read SQL query.

Main class of the program.

The application frame where all GUI components are housed.
MyButton
The button model used throughout the project.
NavigateActionListener
Implementation of the ActionListener interface associated to the navigation through the main panels of the GUI.
Order
Represents a possible order with a client id, a product id, a quantity and an id.

Class that implements specific order SQL queries.

Product

Class that implements specific product SQL queries.

The product panel.

Implementation of the ActionListener interface associated to the read SQL query.
ProductT
The product data transfer object.

Implementation of the ActionListener interface associated to the creation, update and deletion in the product panel.

Singleton implementation of the Validator interface.
QueryType
Enumeration of the used query types.

The initial panel that is displayed when the application is run.
